text: Alamgir Karim, from the National Institute of Standards and Technology, was awarded the status of Fellow in the American Physical Society, after they were nominated by their Division of Polymer Physics in 2004, for pioneering research on polymer thin films and interfaces, polymer brushes, blend film phase separation, thin film dewetting, pattern formation in block copolymer films, and the application of combinatoric measurement methods to complex polymer physics. == References == Category:Fellows of the American Physical Society Category:American physicists Category:Living people Category:Date of death missing Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Alamgir Karim
